StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetReferralRSs]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@RUC VARCHAR(5) AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @FY int SET @FY = dbo.GetFY(GETDATE())
SELECT DISTINCT RO.ORGANIZATION_ID, RO.NAME FROM MCRISS..RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO INNER JOIN MCRISS..QSN Q ON RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = Q.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE Q.RUC = @RUC AND RO.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'RS' AND Q.FY = @FY AND RO.ISOPEN = 'Y' AND NOT Q.RUC = 'XXXXX'
SET NOCOUNT OFF
